ANIMS.TITLE: Anims
ANIMS.DESCRIPTION:
Descendants of Theorn the Lonely, he who kept the Orb for himself alone. 
Powerful warriors and proud souls, their bodies still bear the marks of their ancestor's curse. 
Their brute strength and resilience make them formidable warriors, but their fierce temperament can sometimes isolate them.

SYLVARIS.TITLE: Sylvaris
SYLVARIS.DESCRIPTION:
Children of nature and guardians of the forests, the Sylvari live in harmony with animals and plants. 
Their connection to Elemia of Darkwood grants them great resistance to disease and a natural compassion. 
Generous, supportive, and wise, they hope one day to see the One Tree rise from its ashes.

FROSTFIRES.TITLE: Frostfires
FROSTFIRES.DESCRIPTION:
Masters of the elements, the Fire-Colds know how to channel the forces of fire, ice, wind, and water. 
Heirs to the teachings of Angorn the Academic, they draw their power from knowledge and discipline. 
Their motto still resonates through the ages: "Knowledge is the key to everything."

ENGINEERS.TITLE: Engineers
ENGINEERS.DESCRIPTION:
Mystics of metal and mechanics, the Engineers give life to the inert. 
Although their knowledge has been waning since Khilia's sacrifice, their ingenuity remains unmatched. 
Builders, inventors, and tinners of the impossible, they wield science as a form of magic.
